name: H3LP B0DG3 (VIC20)
description:
Reset64 is proud to present: 

H3LP B0DG3 (VIC20)  By Derek.

Synopsis:

Help "B0DG3" through the 20 levels, collecting the electronic components he needs from throughout his laboratory to complete his mega project. Unfortunately, his cheeky minions have scattered the components he needs throughout the complex. They are not to keen on B0DG3 getting them back!

H3LP B0DG3 is a 1 player game for your 35kb expanded VIC20, featuring beautiful colour multicolour graphics, 20 brain bending levels and wonderful presentation.

H3LP B0DG3 will work on both PAL and NTSC VIC20s.

VIC20 instructions:

  • THERE ARE FOUR COMPONENTS TO COLLECT PER LEVEL, AND ONCE COLLECTED THE FOUR, HEAD FOR THE FLASHING EXIT TO GO TO THE NEXT LEVEL.
  • THERE ARE TUNNELS THAT TAKE B0DG3 FROM LEFT TO RIGHT OR VICE VERSA FOR SHORT CUTS OR TO GET OUT OF THE WAY OF BADDIES.
  • THERE IS A TIME LIMIT ON EACH LEVEL THAT GETS SLIGHTLY QUICKER AS B0DG3 PROGRESSES THROUGH THE LEVELS.  WHEN THE TIME LIMIT GETS TOO LOW, A WARNING WILL SOUND AND B0DG3 WILL ALSO FLASH RED.
  • A SHOT ENEMY MAY DROP EITHER MORE FIREPOWER ( AS YOU ONLY HAVE SO MANY BULLETS, SO NEED TO REPLACE THEM WHERE POSSIBLE ), AN EXTRA LIFE OR A TIMER FREEZE.
  • SCORE, LIVES, REMAINING BULLETS AND TIMER ARE AT THE BOTTOM OF EACH SCREEN.
  • B0DG3 CAN ONLY FALL SO FAR OFF PLATFORMS SO BE CAREFUL.
  • MIND THE SPIKES.
  • COLLECTABLES CAN'T BE PICKED UP BY JUMPING UP BELOW THEM, YOU HAVE TO BE ON THE SAME HORIZONTAL LEVEL ( IT WOULD BE TOO EASY OTHERWISE! ).  SIMILARLY A SIMILAR THING APPLIES TO HITTING THE BADDIES ( IT WOULD BE TOO HARD OTHERWISE! ).
  • POINTS ARE SCORED FOR COLLECTING ITEMS, SHOOTING BADDIES, COMPLETING LEVEL BEFORE TIMER RUN OUT SO RECEIVING A TIMER BONUS.
  • JOYSTICK OR KEYBOARD. 

Keyboard Controls:

Q: UP, A: DOWN, O: LEFT P: RIGHT

SPACEBAR: JUMP

LEFT / RIGHT TO MOVE B0DG3, UP / DOWN TO FIRE A BULLET, SPACEBAR TO JUMP.

In Game Keys: -

SHIFT AND H: PAUSE

SHIFT AND F7: QUIT GAME

H3LP B0DG3 will work on a Commodore VIC20, TheC64/TheVIC20 or your favourite VIC20 emulator. A file configured and ready to play on the The C64/TheVIC20 is included in the downloads, as well as a standard PRG file and D64 image.

NOTE: H3LP B0DG3 requires 35kb RAM Expansion to work.
